headline: Solar stocks jump, casino names surge, Ford Q2 sales increase
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Josh Lipton covers the trading day's top stories in this segment of Market Minute. Solar stocks Sunrun (RUN), SolarEdge (SEDG), and Enphase (ENPH) climb as President Trump's tax and spending bill clears the Senate. Casino stocks, including Las Vegas Sands (LVS), Wynn Resorts (WYNN), and MGM Resorts (MGM), surge after Macau's June gaming revenue beats expectations. Ford (F) stock gains after the company reported a 14.2% increase in second quarter US sales, driven by strong demand for trucks, hybrids, and SUVs. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

content.title: Solar stocks jump, casino names surge, Ford Q2 sales increase
content.description:
Yahoo Finance anchor Josh Lipton covers the trading day's top stories in this segment of Market Minute.

Solar stocks Sunrun (RUN), SolarEdge (SEDG), and Enphase (ENPH) climb as President Trump's tax and spending bill clears the Senate.

Casino stocks, including Las Vegas Sands (LVS), Wynn Resorts (WYNN), and MGM Resorts (MGM), surge after Macau's June gaming revenue beats expectations.

Ford (F) stock gains after the company reported a 14.2% increase in second quarter US sales, driven by strong demand for trucks, hybrids, and SUVs.

Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Casino Stocks Pop as Macau Gaming Revenue Surges
summary: Shares of casino operators Wynn Resorts, Las Vegas Sands, and MGM Resorts International rallied Tuesday as officials in the special administrative region of Macau reported a surge in gaming revenue last month.

content.title: Casino Stocks Pop as Macau Gaming Revenue Surges
content.summary: Shares of casino operators Wynn Resorts, Las Vegas Sands, and MGM Resorts International rallied Tuesday as officials in the special administrative region of Macau reported a surge in gaming revenue last month.

thumbnail.caption: Bloomberg / Getty Images Wynn Resorts' operations in Macau make the company heavily exposed to the Chinese economy

headline: Constellation Brands, AstraZeneca, casino stocks: Trending Tickers
summary: Constellation Brands (STZ) stock rises ahead of the Modelo maker's earnings report. AstraZeneca (AZN) CEO reportedly wants to move the company's listing to the US to avoid UK market restrictions, according to reporting from The Times. Casino stocks, including Las Vegas Sands (LVS) and Wynn (WYNN), are climbing after Macau gaming sales beat expectations, according to a government report. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts here.

headline: Macau casino stocks soar as June gaming revenue beats expectations
summary: Investing.com -- Shares of major casino operators with exposure to Macau surged on Tuesday after the Chinese gambling hub reported a 19% YoY increase in June gaming revenue, significantly exceeding analyst expectations.

content.title: Macau casino stocks soar as June gaming revenue beats expectations
content.summary: Investing.com -- Shares of major casino operators with exposure to Macau surged on Tuesday after the Chinese gambling hub reported a 19% YoY increase in June gaming revenue, significantly exceeding analyst expectations.
